## Excercise 1

Calculate log(6.2) first using base e and second using base 10.

```{r}
log( 6.2, base = exp( 1 ) )
log( 6.2, base = 10 )
```

## Excercise 2

Calculate the square root of 2 and save the result as the variable named sqrt2. Have R display the decimal value of sqrt2.

```{r}
sqrt2 = sqrt( 2 )
sqrt2
```
